start.text: Citizen. This is a restricted area. Please state your purpose for being here.

choices.text: I'm here to help. I have some information.

neutral_response.text: See that you do. We're trying to maintain order here. Don't make our job harder.

hostile_response.text: That's not how this works. I'm going to have to ask you to come with me.

positive_response.text: Information? We'll take any help we can get. What have you got?

choices.text: I saw some suspicious activity over there.
